mapper.sql: a.id, a.right_name, a.right_url, a.this_code, a.parent_code, a.right_order, a.right_type, a.status, a.creat_time, a.update_time
mapper.select: select m.* from t_sys_user u left join t_sys_role r on u.role = r.role_code left join t_sys_menu m on r.role_right = m.this_code where u.id = #{userId} and m.status = 1
